AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nineteen undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling, transported through South Texas with inadequate water and food
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: alien smuggler guide responsible for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury to the undocumented aliens during the smuggling journey through South Texas, found to have recklessly contributed to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez, defendant in the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: person who died during the smuggling operation due to heat stroke caused by the harsh conditions of the South Texas desert trek, described as a 142-pound, normally developed and adequately nourished adult female in the autopsy report
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas Trek: location of the smuggling journey guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, characterized by harsh desert conditions in June that contributed to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez, route taken by the smuggled individuals
